homeSubTitleDisconnected: Connect your wallet to get started
homeSubTitleConnected: Find a Fractal above or create a new one
helperSigners: The total number of trusted users for this Safe.
helperSigThreshold: The number of users needed to approve a proposal.
subTitleTrustedAddresses: These trusted users are able to submit and approve proposals.
helperVotingPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) from a proposal's creation when voting can still occur.
helperQuorum: The percentage of total possible token votes required in order to pass a proposal.
helperProposalExecutionDelay: How many seconds after a proposal successfully passes that it must wait until it can be executed on the blockchain.
governanceDescription: These configuration values may be changed later on by passing a proposal to do so on your DAO.
helperExecutionPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) a successful proposal must be executed within. Must be greater than 0.
helperTimelockPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) a proposal must be queued before being executed.
helperVetoVotesThreshold: Total votes required to veto a tx.
helperFreezeVotesThreshold: Total votes required to veto all txs.
helperFreezeProposalPeriod: The length of time (in seconds) between a proposal's starting and ending point. Must be greater than 0.
helperFreezePeriod: The length of time (in seconds) between a freeze's starting and ending point. Must be greater than 0.
vetoGuardDescription: The Veto Setup values are editable at this time. A default value has been placed in each input box. To change these values, a new proposal will need to be created and passed by your members.
helperParentAllocation: Amount of tokens to allocate to parent DAO.
helperTokenName: What will your governance token be called?
helperTokenSymbol: A 3-5 character symbol for your token.
helperTokenSupply: The total supply of tokens. Unallocated tokens will be placed in your DAO's treasury.
descMultisigGov: Multi-signature DAO governance on a Safe contract wallet.
descUsulGov: ERC-20 token voting governance on a Safe contract wallet, powered by Usul mod.
helperFractalName: What will your DAO be called?
